name: Simhadri
description: Simhadri, a loyal servant in a landlord's house, also leads a secret life as Singamalai, a powerful leader in the state of Kerala.
keywords: character name as title,one word title,secret,axe in the chest,stabbing

review.author: saimanikumarsai
review.heading: Evergreen mass entertainer
review.reviewBody:
First of all the plot was good at when it was making time period. As u can see many of the after and upcoming movies from ss Rajamouli are the base of this one. The hero hitting shots and a leader would not be made by hereditary but made himself as a leader these subtles are more discussed in this film. As of then it was a blockbuster and industry hit at that time.

Jrntr perfomance is just lit and it can be simply said that he played one of his best roles of his lifetime . This film made SSR a star director and ntr most profitable movie.

If you've haven't watched this. Make it comfortable do yourself a favour watch this.
